INTEGER VALID

{{- tag | abs: -10.10 }}

{{- tag | abs: -200 }}

{{- tag | abs: 10.2345 }}

INTEGER ERRORS

{{- tag | truncate: -10 }}

INTEGER CANNOT HAVE THIRD DECIMAL POINT

{{- tag | abs: -10.100.22 }}


NUMBER VALID

{{- tag | truncate: 10 }}

{{- tag | truncate: 1 }}

NUMBER INVALID

{{- tag | truncate: 10.10 }}

{{- tag | truncate: 0.1 }}


FLOAT VALID

{{- tag | abs: 1000.133 }}

FLOAT INVALID

{{- tag | truncate: 1000.133 }}
